mapper.select: select * from (select /*+index_desc(tbl_board pk_board) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_board where rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) s where s.rn > ((#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount})
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) VALUES(seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title} , CONTENT = #{content} , UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE BNO = #{bno}
